about: I'm a Senior Automation Developer at Hexagon with a passion for DevOps, cloud infrastructure automation, and configuration management. With over 3 years of professional experience, I specialize in automating Azure resource provisioning using Terraform, ARM Templates, and PowerShell, while also implementing configuration automation through Puppet and Azure DSC.

I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Chandigarh University (2017-2021). My journey in technology has taken me from software development to DevOps automation, where I've successfully reduced deployment times by up to 80% through innovative automation solutions. I'm driven by the challenge of solving complex infrastructure problems and continuously learning new technologies to deliver efficient, scalable solutions.

experience.title: Senior Automation Developer
experience.description: Leading automation initiatives for Smart Cloud infrastructure and configuration management.
responsibilities: Migrated Smart Cloud's ARM template (JSON) based deployments to code-based deployments using Terraform
Implemented and delivered Puppet profiles for configuration of Hexagon WebAPI products, reducing delivery time by up to 80%
Architected and maintained Cloud Automation backend services for Intergraph Smart Cloud Portal, collaborating closely with frontend teams to integrate seamless application delivery workflows
Streamlined user onboarding, product deployment, and upgrade processes for Hexagon products hosted in Smart Cloud environment, ensuring rapid delivery and enhanced user experience
Provided ongoing support for ad-hoc automation via PowerShell scripts and Azure Runbooks
